projects.name: OceanDAO
projects.tagline: Decentralized ocean DNA sequencing and marine research
projects.description: OceanDAO is accelerating breakthrough research in ocean genomics through decentralized funding and open collaboration. Our community of marine biologists, oceanographers, and environmental scientists is working to sequence and understand marine DNA to protect ocean biodiversity, discover new species, and develop sustainable marine biotechnology.
projects.longDescription: By democratizing access to ocean research data and creating new funding mechanisms for marine exploration, we're building a future where ocean conservation is driven by scientific understanding and community action.

milestones.title: DAO Infrastructure & Community Building
milestones.description: Launch governance token, establish DAO structure, recruit initial research team, build community of 1000+ members

milestones.title: Ocean DNA Database Launch
milestones.description: Deploy sequencing infrastructure, standardize analysis pipelines, onboard first 10,000 samples, launch researcher portal

milestones.title: Decentralized Research Network
milestones.description: Fund first 5 research expeditions, establish marine lab partnerships, launch citizen scientist program with 5,000+ participants

milestones.title: Marine Conservation Applications
milestones.description: Deploy AI models for species identification, create endangered species tracking system, establish conservation partnerships

milestones.title: Commercialization & Sustainability
milestones.description: License discoveries for sustainable biotech, establish marine protected areas, sustainable revenue flowing to DAO treasury

initiatives.title: Ocean Genome Atlas
initiatives.description: Building the world's largest open-access database of marine DNA samples with standardized metadata and analysis pipelines.

initiatives.title: Species Discovery AI
initiatives.description: Using machine learning to identify new marine species from environmental DNA samples collected worldwide.

initiatives.title: Floating Labs Network
initiatives.description: Establishing decentralized research vessels where citizen scientists can conduct ocean DNA sampling.

initiatives.title: Ocean Health Monitor
initiatives.description: Creating a global network for real-time ocean health monitoring through DNA analysis.

marketHypothesis.opportunity: The global ocean economy is projected to reach $3 trillion by 2030. Ocean genomics represents a $50B+ opportunity in marine biotechnology, conservation, and sustainable resource management.
problems: Less than 5% of the ocean has been explored
Marine biodiversity loss accelerating faster than terrestrial
Limited funding for ocean research compared to space exploration
Fragmented data and lack of collaboration between institutions

thesis.title: Decentralized Ocean Exploration
thesis.description: Open collaboration accelerates discovery by 10x compared to traditional marine research. Our network enables any researcher or citizen scientist to contribute.

thesis.title: Community-Driven Conservation
thesis.description: Local communities know their waters best. By giving them tools and governance power, we ensure conservation efforts have real impact.

thesis.title: Blue Economy Innovation
thesis.description: Tokenizing marine discoveries creates liquid markets for ocean IP, enabling faster development of sustainable ocean technologies.

thesis.title: Global Ocean Network
thesis.description: Each new researcher, sample, and dataset makes the network more valuable, creating a flywheel for ocean conservation.

valueCaptureModel.title: Marine Biotech Licensing
valueCaptureModel.description: Revenue from sustainable marine biotechnology applications and biomaterials

valueCaptureModel.title: Research Services
valueCaptureModel.description: Environmental DNA analysis services for governments and conservation organizations

valueCaptureModel.title: Data Monetization
valueCaptureModel.description: Anonymized ocean health data licensed to climate researchers and policy makers

valueCaptureModel.title: Marine Pharmaceuticals
valueCaptureModel.description: Discovery of novel compounds from marine organisms for medical applications

valueCaptureModel.title: Education Platform
valueCaptureModel.description: Ocean science courses and certification programs for marine conservationists

valueCaptureModel.title: Carbon Credits
valueCaptureModel.description: Blue carbon credits from protected marine ecosystems

tokenomics.name: Ocean Token
utility: Governance rights over research priorities and treasury allocation
Staking for access to premium ocean data and analysis tools
Rewards for contributing samples, research, or peer review
Priority access to research expeditions and discoveries

recommendedReads.title: The Ocean Genome: Unlocking Marine Biodiversity
Decentralized Science: A New Research Paradigm
recommendedReads.description: Why DeSci is the future of research

researchPapers.title: Environmental DNA Reveals Ocean Biodiversity Patterns
Machine Learning for Marine Species Identification
Blue Carbon Sequestration Through Marine Protected Areas
